LanguageData.Building_NR_AutoMachineTool_Planter_Tier: Place the Planter inside or near the agricultural zone. Planter starts planting plants in the agricultural zone within range. By default, Tier 1 is Skill Level 5, Tier 2 is Skill Level 10, and Tier 3 is Skill Level 20.(Skill level can be changed by MOD setting)

Place the Planter inside or near the agricultural zone. Planter starts planting plants in the agricultural zone within range. By default, Tier 1 is Skill Level 5, Tier 2 is Skill Level 10, and Tier 3 is Skill Level 20.(Skill level can be changed by MOD setting)
